entry.title: Combined summary - Reading moderated emails
entry.summary: Bitcoin developers can benefit from using the email listserv bitcoin-dev-moderation, although some emails sent to this list may be moderated. To obtain these emails, a Python script like fast_mail_parser can be used to download the eml file from moderated archives. This script can print the body of the email in base64 format and different parts of the email. To read the email in plain text, it is necessary to decode the relevant line by either pasting the highlighted content into https://www.base64decode.org/ or using b64decode() in Python. The email was sent through ProtonMail, which is a secure email service.
